title: Anna Vakili says she 'didn't work out at all' before Love Island
text:
Anna Vakili has revealed she 'didn’t work out at all' before Love Island – and hasn’t exercised since leaving the villa.

The curvy reality star, 29, confessed she needs to be 'stricter for health reasons' but being in front of the cameras hasn’t motivated her to hit the gym.

She's suffered the wrath of cruel trolls after haters branded her a 'terrorist' but Anna says she's learned to be 'strong' and uses a strict block and delete method to banish negativity.

Bikini babe: Love Island star Anna Vakili has revealed she 'didn't work out at all' before going on the show – and hasn't exercised since

In an exclusive interview with MailOnline, Anna said: 'I don’t have a vigorous work out regime at all – I need to be stricter really for health reasons.

'I didn’t work out at all before going on the show. While I was in Majorca during lockdown was the only time I really thought "maybe I should be a bit healthier."

'I would have thought that coming out and having cameras in my face would make me want to work out but it hasn’t. I’ve been the opposite actually!'

She added: 'I still get trolled but I am getting stronger. I filter out bad comments.

'If I get a DM I read the first few words and if I can tell it’s going to be negative I just block and delete straight away. That’s my way forward.'

Killer curves: The reality TV beauty says she only thought about her physique while she was in Majorca just before entering the villa (in June during the opening scene of the show)

In good spirits: Anna says being in front of the cameras hasn't motivated her to hit the gym but she needs to be 'stricter for health reasons' (taken in September 2019)

Taking a break: Following the dramatic end of her brief romance with Jordan Hames, Anna says she has 'trust issues' and has sworn off dating (in July 2019)

Anna’s time in the villa was rocked by the dramatic end of her relationship with Jordan Hames after he attempted to pursue a romance with India Reynolds.

The experience has left Anna scarred and with 'trust issues' – as she swears off dating for the foreseeable future.

She said: 'After the villa and especially what happened in there it has made me careful.

'It has given me some trust issues but sometimes that’s a good thing. Sometimes it’s a good thing when you don’t trust as easily.

'I’m single at the moment. When it’s the right time I’ll start dating again. I don’t want to put a timeframe on it – when it comes I’ll just know.'

Double trouble: Anna and her lookalike sister Mandi have teamed up on a 16-style capsule edit by shoe brand SIMMI London

Work it: The pair posed together in a shoot that Anna described as 'striking' due to the resemblance between her and Mandi

Curtis Pritchard and Maura Higgins are still in a relationship, as well as Anna's co-stars India and Ovie Soko and runners-up Tommy Fury and Molly-Mae Hague.

But Anna isn't entirely convinced that the couples are still together for love, saying: 'Well... you never know really.'

While her dating life has taken a back seat, Anna continues to shine in her career as she teams up with lookalike sister Mandi on a 16-style capsule edit by SIMMI London.

Speaking about her involvement with the brand, Anna said: 'I loved wearing the shoes even before I went into the villa and I wore them a lot in there.

'We’re twinning in the photoshoot and it looks a lot more striking because of how similar we look. We have a similar style and it looks cooler when we can shoot together.'
description: Love Island star Anna Vakili has revealed she 'didn't work out at all' before Love Island and being in front of the cameras hasn't motivated her to hit the gym since leaving the villa.
